product_name: Seattle Sports Kayak Fishing Anchor Kit
long_description: Don't let the wind or current wreak havoc on your next fishing trip! This simple anchor system will keep you in the strike zone! Pulley system consisting of two carabineer clips, polypropylene rope and roller easily installs to any kayak with deck rigging. Two-pound folding anchor comes rigged with 50 feet of rope. Kit comes with nylon storage bag.
short_description: Don't let the wind or current wreak havoc on your next fishing trip! This simple anchor system will keep you in the strike zone!
